001package imagingbook.common.color.gamma;
002
003/**
004 * Interface to be implemented by gamma correction classes. All in/out component
005 * values are assumed to be in [0,1]. Implementing classes must at least define
006 * a {@code double} version of the required methods but are free to override the
007 * associated {@code float} versions.
008 * 
009 * @author WB
010 * @version 2022/11/16
011 */
012public interface GammaMapping {
013        
014        /**
015         * Forward Gamma mapping (from linear to non-linear component values).
016         * 
017         * @param a linear component value in [0,1]
018         * @return the gamma-corrected (non-linear) component value
019         */
020        public double applyFwd(double a);
021        
022        /**
023     * Float version of {@link #applyFwd(double)}
024     * @param a linear component value in [0,1]
025     * @return the gamma-corrected (non-linear) component value
026     */
027        public default float applyFwd(float a) {
028                return (float) applyFwd((double) a);
029        }
030        
031        /**
032         * Inverse Gamma mapping (from non-linear to linear component values).
033         * 
034         * @param b non-linear (Gamma-corrected) component value in [0,1]
035         * @return the linear component value
036         */
037        public double applyInv(double b);
038        
039        /**
040     * Float version of {@link #applyInv(double)}
041     * @param b non-linear (Gamma-corrected) component value in [0,1]
042     * @return the linear component value
043     */
044        public default float applyInv(float b) {
045                return (float) applyInv((double) b);
046        }
047        
048}
